title: As Joaquin Surprises Fans At LA Theatre, Joker’s IMDb Rating Surpasses That Of The Dark Knight
text:
Do you know, Joaquin Phoenix starrer Joker which is leaving audiences terrified is currently rated higher than The Dark Knight on IMDb. The Dark Knight which starred legendary Heath Ledger in the iconic role has nine on 10 rating from 2.1 million votes. Recently released Joker, on the other hand, has an impressive 9.1/10 from over 115,000 votes.

While many people are left terrified after watching the movie, the security outside and inside the theatres in the US has been increased. Police fear that Joker could inspire another incident like 2012 Aurora, Colorado theatre shooting, where a gunman called James Holmes killed 12 people at the opening weekend of The Dark Night Rises, a Batman film. Hence, even masks and face paints has been banned at the cinema halls.

Hailed as the unsettling movie, Joker, which people think can help Joaquin Phoenix bag an Oscar has also been smashing box office records. The movie minted USD 93.5 million over the weekend and became the biggest October launch of all time.
